task: Create Master Resource Index & Synthesize Agent Inventories
description: You are the orchestrator for this 3-phase session. Create initial master index from reference site, then synthesize all agent inventories into unified ecosystem master list.

phase_1_instructions.step_2: EXTRACT all documented resources by category: MCP Tools, Slash Commands, Workflows, Scripts, Utilities
phase_1_instructions.step_3: CREATE orchestrator-master-index.md with comprehensive categorized list

phase_2_instructions.note: Wait for all 9 agents to complete their inventories using agent-communication.json
phase_2_instructions.monitoring: Check agent-communication.json aggregation.completed count until it reaches 9

phase_3_instructions.step_1: READ all 9 agent inventory files (coderef-assistant-inventory.md, coderef-context-inventory.md, etc.)
phase_3_instructions.step_3: COMPARE each agent inventory against master index
phase_3_instructions.step_4: IDENTIFY missing items (resources in agent inventories NOT in master index)
phase_3_instructions.step_5: CREATE ecosystem-index.md documenting all resources that exist in ecosystem but were missing from reference site
phase_3_instructions.step_6: CREATE final-master-index.md synthesizing orchestrator-master-index.md + all agent inventories into single comprehensive list

master_index_template:
# Master Resource Index

## MCP Tools
### coderef-context
- tool_name: Description

### coderef-workflow
- tool_name: Description

## Slash Commands
- /command: Description

## Workflows
- workflow-name: Description

## Scripts
- script-name.py: Description

## Utilities
- utility-name: Description
ecosystem_index_template:
# Ecosystem Resources Not in Reference Site

## Missing from Index

### MCP Tools
**Agent:** coderef-context
- missing_tool: Description (found in agent inventory, not in master index)

### Scripts
**Agent:** coderef-system
- missing_script.py: Description

## Summary
- Total missing items: X
- By category: MCP Tools (X), Scripts (X), Workflows (X), etc.

quality_standards.completeness: All resources from index.html captured in phase 1. All 9 agent inventories reviewed in phase 3. All gaps documented in ecosystem-index.md.
quality_standards.accuracy: Exact tool names, command syntax, and descriptions. No duplicates. Consistent categorization.
quality_standards.format: Markdown with clear headings. Bulleted lists. Agent attribution for missing items. Summary statistics.
